36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Uthman bin 'Affan narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"There is no right for the son of Adam in other than these things: A house which he lives in, a garment which covers his nakedness, and Jilf (a piece of bread) and water

chapter.eng-name: The Things For Which The Son Of Adam Has No Right Over Other Than Them
